People

This is a list of people are doing interesting things with OpenAPI, AsyncAPI, JSON Schema, and Postman Collections, organized as part of OpenAPI demand generation efforts.

Kin Lane - Kin Lane is tje Chief Evangelist for Postmn, and performs as the API Evangelist at the intersection of the technology, business, and politics of APIs. - Evangelisms

Tags:

Website Github Twitter

Phil Sturgeon - Phil builds API Design tools for Stoplight.io, write about pragmatic API design, systems architecture, live on a bike, and occasionally upset hordes of mens rights activists on Reddit. - Evangelisms

Tags:

Website Github Twitter

If you have any questions, comments, or suggestions for people, please leave an issue on the GitHub repository for this project, or feel free to submit a pull request.


This work is sponsored by Postman as part of their support of the OpenAPI
